  • BlizzCMS
    A CMS focused on offering services for World of Warcraft servers. With more than 5 years of development.

From Inception to Evolution: Unveiling the WoW-CMS Project Timeline

Join us as we unveil the story behind the inception, milestones, and transformative decisions that have shaped the WoW-CMS project into what it is today.

  1. Start of the project

    Start on Febraury 21, 2019

    The journey of WoW-CMS as a project officially begins. Initially it is started by two people Dzywolf and Darthar.

  2. Release and update of BlizzCMS.

    Released on Febraury 21, 2019

    BlizzCMS Plus sees the light, soon the WoW-CMS.com website receives nearly 50,000 views in its launch, becoming the largest project launch.

  3. Release BlizzCMS v2.

    Released on January 12, 2023

    What does destiny hold for us? No one knows, once BlizzCMS v1 came out we decided to take a turn and start development on v2.

Frequently asked questions

What is a free and open-source CMS?

A free and open-source CMS (Content Management System) is a platform where users can create, manage, and publish content online easily and efficiently. This type of CMS is characterized by being freely accessible, meaning anyone can use it for free and have access to the source code of the software. This allows users to customize, modify, and enhance the system according to their needs and preferences.

What are the advantages of using a free and open-source CMS?

When using a free and open-source CMS, users benefit from several advantages. Some of the key advantages include:


  • Cost: Being free, it is affordable for anyone who wants to start a project.
  • Flexibility: The open-source code allows for modifications and customizations based on specific project needs.
  • Active community: Being open source, the community tends to be larger, so it is easy to find help.
  • Security: Being open-source, the code can be reviewed by the community to identify and address potential security vulnerabilities.

What does "free updates" include?

The free updates that will be provided is based on the roadmap that we have laid out for this project. It is also possible that we will provide extra updates outside of the roadmap as well.

WoWCMS

Is a group of web developers who in their free time are dedicated to creating, managing and maintaining cms for the growing community of online games
